name: Sleep on Dear Willie
description:
Vimy Ridge, 1917.

On the verge of one of Canada's most significant operations in the First World War, Private William Henry Bell has been surviving on the trenches, trying to fight for his country while keeping himself breathing. However, left with almost nothing except his life and his friend Edward, will he try to help those around him, or put his well-being first?

Features

  • Over 15 000 words, with original music and unique characters
  • Several branching paths, with 3 endings to find
  • Based (albeit loosely) on the letters of the real Private William Henry Bell

Credits:

  • Sam Mackenzie: Lead Designer & Writing
  • Gerard van Genderen: Lead Producer & Music
  • Bayley Sapara: Art & Programming
  • Si Lun Zhang: Programming
  • Zepeng Xiao: Programming

(Background: Ghosts of Vimy Ridge by Will Longstaff)
